text: The 'rock_simulation.py' script was interrupted due to a keyboard interrupt. I should use the 'write_to_file' command to save the output of the script to a file so that I can review it later.
reasoning: I want to make sure that I can review the output of the 'rock_simulation.py' script later, even though it was interrupted due to a keyboard interrupt.
plan: - Use the 'write_to_file' command to save the output of the 'rock_simulation.py' script to a file.
criticism: I should have included a timestamp in the filename of the output file so that I can easily distinguish between different runs of the 'rock_simulation.py' script.
speak: I will save the output of the 'rock_simulation.py' script to a file using the 'write_to_file' command.
